Address.value: 10578 SCIENCE CENTER DRIVE,SUITE 125, SAN DIEGO, California, 92121, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Avidity Biosciences Inc is a biotechnology company. The company develops novel Antibody Oligonucleotide Conjugates therapies designed to overcome the current limitations of oligonucleotide therapies in order to treat a wide range of serious diseases. Its product candidate AOC 1001, is designed to treat a rare monogenic muscle disease.
